title: Nike Climb Boosts Dow, S&P 500
summary: An increase in shares of  Nike  boosted major indexes on Wednesday.  The sportswear brand’s stock added 4.6% after a filing showed  Apple  Chief Executive  Tim Cook,  who serves on Nike’s board, recently bought about $2.9 million of shares following the company’s disappointing earnings last week.  The S&P 500 rose 0.3% to its 39th record close of 2025.
